Translations.Text: The Fig acts as a witness, and the olive (see)
and this Trustee City (which is protected and protects the rituals of Religion, like Salat, Tawaf, Umra, Hajj and I'tikaf)
Surely, without doubt, We created the human being in better stability and capacity (regarding choice, wisdom and understanding etc)
Thereafter We allowed him to turn lowest of the low —
excluding those who Believed and performed righteous deeds. So, for them is a reward — not interrupted (and never to be) stopped
Then what makes you deny after (knowing all these facts) the Accountability
Is not Allah the Better Judge among all who judge
